content.html: Maybe @techgirl1908 and I can jump on a Space and talk about decentralized protocols, and why I think they might work along side the status quo. I'd love to be able to host my own content, but lets be honest, most people don't have the time, money, or skills. We should fix that.
content.value:
Maybe @techgirl1908 and I can jump on a Space and talk about decentralized protocols, and why I think they might work along side the status quo.

I'd love to be able to host my own content, but lets be honest, most people don't have the time, money, or skills. We should fix that.
